newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD WOMEN'S 5,000 METRES CHAMPION SZABO.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD WOMEN'S 5,000 METRES CHAMPION SZABO.

text.p: Profile of Gabriela Szabo, who won the world women's 5,000 metres title on Saturday.
Youngest ever world indoor champion at 19 over 3,000 metres in 1995.
Was fourth that same year in Gothenburg, where the 5,000 metres was introduced at world outdoor championships.
Took Olympic silver over 1,500 metres last year in Atlanta after failing to qualify for the 5,000 final.
Set a year's best of 14 minutes 42.43 seconds for the 5,000 last month in Oslo.
